name: Ebrius Maleficus
description:
One Control, Click to change the direction of gravity
One Hitpoint.
One way through one of 5 mazes chosen randomly.

A lot of features were cut to make the 48 hour deadline. 

Hope you like it

Programming / Art / Most Everything - Joseph Woodrell

Music heavily edited but originally came from:
"Deadly Roulette" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
